attributes.action: work with the government to allow a vote of no confidence in the Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the great majority of people in this country beleieve that only with a new Speaker can Parliament even begin to regain its former moral authority

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
